https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/g9AD51O3Y1FErXQVVexekFStz0m.jpg Panos Pampanos has a double life. For Thalia, the daughter of his best friend and his protege, is a moral man of strict principles. But, he is nothing but a party animal hiding behind behind the mask of a nephew he has invented himself. Misunderstandings succeed one another... A Crazy Party Animal
